/* EXPERIMENTAL CODE - NON COMPILEABLE VERSION OF C++ */
/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/

package example.one;
import example.two.*;

class Mentor
{
  private:

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Mentor Attributes
  String name;

  //Mentor Associations
  private Student student;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------
  public:

  public Mentor(String aName)
  {
    name = aName;
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  boolean setName(String aName)
  {
    bool wasSet = false;
    name = aName;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;
  }

  String getName()
  {
    return name;
  }

  Student getStudent()
  {
    return student;
  }

  public void delete()
  {
    if (student != null)
    {
      if (student.numberOfMentors() <= 1)
      {
        student.delete();
      }
      else
      {
        Student placeholderStudent = student;
        this.student = null;
        placeholderStudent.removeMentor(this);
      }
    }
  }

};
